response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we're confident it's worth every penny. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure this item at a price that still yields a significant return for us. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 9500}
